sections.pali: ‘‘Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimānaṃ…pe… vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
‘‘Ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, ahosiṃ yavapālako; Addasaṃ virajaṃ bhikkhuṃ, vippasannamanāvilaṃ.
‘‘Tassa adāsahaṃ bhāgaṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi; Kummāsapiṇḍaṃ datvāna, modāmi nandane vane.
‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti. Yavapālakavimānaṃ sattamaṃ.
